product_name: Topeak Whitelite HP1W Bike Headlight - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The powerful and efficient 1W LED in this bike headlight produces bright light and long run times to illuminate your way and keep you visible to oncoming traffic as you ride through the night.
short_description: The powerful and efficient 1W LED in this bike headlight produces bright light and long run times to illuminate your way and keep you visible to oncoming traffic as you ride through the night.
